organization.fullName: The First People's Hospital of Lianyungang

identificationModule.briefTitle: B7-H3 Targeting CAR-T Cells Therapy for B7-H3 Positive Solid Tumors
identificationModule.officialTitle: An Open, Single-arm Clinical Study of Autologous T Cells (CAR-T) Targeting B7-H3 Chimeric Antigen Receptor Gene in the Treatment of Patients With Advanced Gastrointestinal Tumors

leadSponsor.name: The First People's Hospital of Lianyungang

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This is a clinical study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of CAR-T cells in the treatment of patients with advanced solid tumors in China.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: This is a single-center, single-arm, open-label study. This study is planned to enroll about 30 subjects with advanced solid tumors. Autologous CAR-T cells were then infused intravenously into subjects, in a dose-escalating 3+3 design.
